WorkflowInfo.Name: Download and delete largest file
WorkflowInfo.Description: download and delete the largest file from ftp server
WorkflowInfo.Details: This process opens an FTP connection and retrieves a list of all files in a given path, sorts them by their size (descending) and deletes the first file in the list. Use this process keep free space on your FTP server.
WorkflowInfo.XML: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?><SequentialWorkflowActivity x:Name="CustomWorkflow" xmlns:ns0="clr-namespace:StartFTPSession;Assembly=StartFTPSession, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns1="clr-namespace:FTPListFolder;Assembly=FTPListFolder, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns2="clr-namespace:ResultSetFilter;Assembly=ResultSetFilter, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns3="clr-namespace:SortTable;Assembly=SortTable, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns4="clr-namespace:GetCellValue;Assembly=GetCellValue, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns5="clr-namespace:FTPGetFile;Assembly=FTPGetFile, Version=1.1.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns6="clr-namespace:FTPDeleteFile;Assembly=FTPDeleteFile, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:ns7="clr-namespace:TerminateFTPSession;Assembly=TerminateFTPSession, Version=1.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=null" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"><ns0:StartFTPSession Password="" HostName="LocalHost" DisplayName="Start FTP Session" IsValid="True" HostId="1" Port="21" TypeName="StartFTPSession" Description="Starts FTP Session." TimeInSeconds="0" MaxSessionTime="00:10:00" x:Name="startFTPSession1" Timeout="00:01:00" Passive="0" UserName="" SecureConnection="0" StartSession="FTP" /><ns1:FTPListFolder SessionName="startFTPSession1" x:Name="ftpListFolder1" TimeInSeconds="0" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="{x:Null}" DisplayName="FTP List Folder" Path="/" Description="FTP list folder." HostId="0" TypeName="FTPListFolder" /><ns2:ResultSetFilter IsValid="True" x:Name="resultSetFilter1" Timeout="00:01:00" DisplayName="ResultSet Filter" VariableName="%ftpListFolder1%" Description="Filter a Result Set" TypeName="ResultSetFilter" FilterStatement="Type = 'File'" /><ns3:SortTable IsValid="True" x:Name="sortTable1" NameType="0" DisplayName="Sort Table" ResultSetName="%resultSetFilter1%" Description="Sorts the specified table by the specified columns." SortStatement="Size DESC" TypeName="SortTable" /><ns4:GetCellValue IsValid="True" x:Name="FileName" ColumnNumber="2" ResultSet="%sortTable1%" RowNumber="1" ResultSetName="sortTable1" Description="Gets a specific cell value from a resultset." DisplayName="Get Cell Value" TypeName="GetCellValue" /><ns5:FTPGetFile TargetPath="c:\logs" SessionName="startFTPSession1" x:Name="ftpGetFile1" HostName="{x:Null}" TimeInSeconds="0" Timeout="00:10:00" IsValid="True" DisplayName="FTP Get File" SourcePath="/%FileName%" Description="FTP get a file." HostId="0" TypeName="FTPGetFile" TransferMode="0" /><ns6:FTPDeleteFile SessionName="startFTPSession1" x:Name="ftpDeleteFile1" TimeInSeconds="0" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="{x:Null}" DisplayName="FTP Delete File" Path="/%FileName%" Description="FTP delete a file." HostId="0" TypeName="FTPDeleteFile" /><ns7:TerminateFTPSession SessionName="startFTPSession1" x:Name="terminateFTPSession1" TimeInSeconds="0" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" HostName="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Terminate FTP Session" Description="Terminate FTP session." HostId="0" TypeName="TerminateFTPSession" /></SequentialWorkflowActivity>
